content.json:
## Traffic Logs workbook
---

Log information in the dashboard is limited to 30 days.

parameters.name: LogAnalyticWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytic Workspace
parameters.description: The log analytic workspace in which to execute the queries

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogsDemos_CL
| summarize Count = count() by UserId_s
| order by Count desc, UserId_s asc
| project Value = UserId_s, Label = strcat(UserId_s, ' - ', Count, ' Logs'), Selected = false

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| project 
    Timestamp = createdDateTime_t,
    User = userPrincipalName_s,
    SourceIP = SourceIP,
    DestinationIP = destinationIp_s,
    DestinationPort = destinationPort_d,
    Action = action_s,
    PolicyName = policyName_s,
    TransportProtocol = transportProtocol_s,
    TrafficType = trafficType_s,
    DestinationURL = destinationUrl_s,
    ReceivedBytes = receivedBytes_d,
    SentBytes = sentBytes_d,
    DeviceOS = deviceOperatingSystem_s,
    PolicyRuleID = policyRuleId_s
| order by Timestamp desc
content.title: Log

content.query:
// Unique Users
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIP) // Extend each row with geolocation info
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| project SourceIP, Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| summarize UniqueUsers=dcount(Country)
| extend snapshot = "Total Locations"
| project col1 = UniqueUsers, snapshot

// Union with Unique Devices
| union (
    NetworkAccessDemo_CL
    | where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
    | extend BytesInGB = todouble(sentBytes_d + receivedBytes_d) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)  // Convert bytes to gigabytes
    | summarize TotalBytesGB = sum(BytesInGB)
    | extend snapshot = "Total Bytes (GB)"
    | project col1 =   tolong(TotalBytesGB), snapshot
)

// Union with Total Internet Access
| union (
    NetworkAccessDemo_CL
    | where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
    | summarize TotalTransactions = count()
    | extend snapshot = "Total Transactions"
    | project col1 = TotalTransactions, snapshot
)

// Union with Total Private Access
// Order by Snapshot for consistent tile ordering on dashboard
| order by snapshot

NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend BytesInGB = todouble(sentBytes_d + receivedBytes_d) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)  // Convert bytes to gigabytes
| summarize TotalBytesGB = sum(BytesInGB) by bin(createdDateTime_t, 1h), trafficType_s
| order by bin(createdDateTime_t, 1h) asc, trafficType_s asc
| project createdDateTime_t, trafficType_s, TotalBytesGB
content.title: Usage over Time (GB)

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIP) // Extend each row with geolocation info
| project  createdDateTime_t, SourceIP, Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| where Country != ""
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Locations

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where tolower(action_s) == "allow" and destinationWebCategory_displayName_s != '' // Filter for allowed traffic
| extend firstCategory = tostring(split(destinationWebCategory_displayName_s, ',')[0]) // Split and get the first category
| summarize Count = count() by firstCategory
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Allowed Web Categories

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where tolower(action_s) == "block" and destinationFQDN_s != '' // Filter for allowed traffic
| summarize Count = count() by destinationFQDN_s
| top 100 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Destinations

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where tolower(action_s) == "block" and destinationWebCategory_displayName_s != '' // Filter for blocked traffic
| extend firstCategory = tostring(split(destinationWebCategory_displayName_s, ',')[0]) // Split and get the first category
| summarize Count = count() by firstCategory
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Web Categories

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where sentBytes_d > 0
| where tolower(action_s) != "block" 
| summarize Count = count() , Sent = sum(sentBytes_d), Recived = sum(receivedBytes_d), Total = sum(receivedBytes_d+ sentBytes_d) by destinationFQDN_s
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Allowed Destinations

content.query:
NetworkAccessDemo_CL
| where userPrincipalName_s in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where transportProtocol_s != ''
| summarize Count = count() by toupper(transportProtocol_s)
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Protocol Distburion
